version_description:
OPTIMIZATION
— faster loading time
— enhanced netcode

CONTENT UPDATES
— desert map improved
— first weapon pack restyled

AUDIO
— music and sounds revamped
— new combat sounds added

OVERALL
— lots of visible and under-the-hood fixes and tweaks

— enhanced netcode

— new combat sounds added

OPTIMIZATION
— faster loading time
— enhanced netcode

CONTENT UPDATES
— desert map improved
— first weapon pack restyled

AUDIO
— music and sounds revamped
— new combat sounds added

OVERALL
— lots of visible and under-the-hood fixes and tweaks

NEW
- 2 new dinosaurs
- New game modes: Deathmatch and Team Deathmatch
- Mark your owned dinos as "Favorites" so they're always near

IMPROVEMENTS
- Temple of Agratokk upgraded: cooler visuals and sounds
- All weapons and gear restyled
- New visual effects for all weapons and some abilities
- Better graphics performance
- Reduced ping

FIXES
- Lots of visible and under-the-hood fixes

NEW
- 2 new dinosaurs
- New game modes: Deathmatch and Team Deathmatch
- Mark your owned dinos as "Favorites" so they're always near

IMPROVEMENTS
- Temple of Agratokk upgraded: cooler visuals and sounds
- All weapons and gear restyled
- New visual effects for all weapons and some abilities
- Better graphics performance
- Reduced ping

FIXES
- Lots of visible and under-the-hood fixes

NEW
- 2 new dinosaurs
- New game modes: Deathmatch and Team Deathmatch
- Mark your owned dinos as "Favorites" so they're always near

IMPROVEMENTS
- Temple of Agratokk upgraded: cooler visuals and sounds
- All weapons and gear restyled
- New visual effects for all weapons and some abilities
- Better graphics performance
- Reduced ping

FIXES
- Lots of visible and under-the-hood fixes

NEW
- New dinosaurs: Diplodocus, Giganotosaurus, Carnotaurus, Ceratosaurus, Arambourgiania
- Squad Battles
- Friends list
- New map
- Killing sprees announced
- All Weapons ability
- Observer mode

IMPROVEMENTS
- Improved battle interface
- More convenient aiming mechanism
- More players now supported in battle
- Ability special effects now even cooler
- Improved connection quality (smaller ping)

NEW
- New dinosaurs: Diplodocus, Giganotosaurus, Carnotaurus, Ceratosaurus, Arambourgiania
- Squad Battles
- Friends list
- New map
- Killing sprees announced
- All Weapons ability
- Observer mode

IMPROVEMENTS
- Improved battle interface
- More convenient aiming mechanism
- More players now supported in battle
- Ability special effects now even cooler
- Improved connection quality (smaller ping)

NEW
- Incubator
- Dinosaurs: Stalker, Harbringer, Salvadore, Claw
- Abilities: Ghost Sprint, Acid Sphere, Dig, Enemy Jump, Arena, Fear, Siege Mode, Blink
- Low HP indicator
- Recommendation panel
- Equipped weapons shown in battle
- ZOOM button in battle
- Shooting vibration
- Check battle stats while the battle is still going on

NEW
- Incubator
- Dinosaurs: Stalker, Harbringer, Salvadore, Claw
- Abilities: Ghost Sprint, Acid Sphere, Dig, Enemy Jump, Arena, Fear, Siege Mode, Blink
- Low HP indicator
- Recommendation panel
- Equipped weapons shown in battle
- ZOOM button in battle
- Check battle stats while the battle is still going on

NEW
- Incubator
- Dinosaurs: Stalker, Harbringer, Salvadore, Claw
- Abilities: Ghost Sprint, Acid Sphere, Dig, Enemy Jump, Arena, Fear, Siege Mode, Blink
- Low HP indicator
- Recommendation panel
- Equipped weapons shown in battle
- ZOOM button in battle
- Check battle stats while the battle is still going on

What's new:
The long-awaited Pentaceratops Symbiote — this unstoppable killing machine is bolting straight onto the dinosaur battlefield. Its ability, Storm, sends it charging into the fray at high speeds to stun enemies, and its front shield protects against most attacks.
New symbiote weapons:
Beholder is a universal weapon capable of firing at long distances, but the closer you are to the enemy, the more damage they take.
Hell Eye is a long-distance laser that deals increasing damage the longer you hold it on an enemy.
Thunderbolt is a close range weapon that strikes every enemy in a 50 meter radius with chain lightning.
Quests — win and play more to earn extra rewards!
In-battle vibrations when receiving damage so you can react faster in dangerous situations (can be disabled in the settings).
Cool new icons for Crystals and Fuel.

Changes:
Weapon reloading mechanics changed — now you don't need to completely unload your weapon for it to be reloaded, you just need to stop firing! But remember: any shot resets the cooldown.
Increased damage of close range weapons: MA-56, MA-56-H, PARA-7, PARA-9.
Sarcosuchus now has an icon showing how much air he has left so you can control him better in battle.
Minor interface changes, including icons and how they're arranged.
Movement animations updated — it might seem like some of the dinosaurs are now slower or faster, but don't be fooled!

Fixes:
Fixed the bug where a dinosaur spawns multiple times
Fixed dino deceleration on hills
Lots of other minor fixes and tweaks

What's new:
- Drones: Add extra firepower to your dinosaur!
- New dinosaur – Archelon Mechanical: devours its enemies and grows stronger!
- New dinosaur – Basilosaurus Mechanical: master of the seas now comes to rule the skies!
- New weapon – AciDragon: showers its enemies with acid rain
- New weapon Chupacabra: replenish your health by damaging enemies
- Crystals conversion

Some changes were made:
- Anti-cheat system improved
- Friction on vertical surfaces reduced

– New Kronosaurus Mechanical dino! It can fly and dig underground. Also, the dino has a set of abilities and weapons for each of these modes.

– Chests – now you can get keys for participating in battles. These keys are used to open chests containing dinos, weapons, and other valuable items. You'll get a free chest with a cool reward if you manage to open the required number of chests before the season ends!

– Map fixes – filled in map holes through which players could get outside the map or inside buildings/objects.

– Auto-Shooting fix – now the weapon will shoot automatically only if the target is within the damage radius.

– New Kronosaurus Mechanical dino! It can fly and dig underground. Also, the dino has a set of abilities and weapons for each of these modes.

– Chests – now you can get keys for participating in battles. These keys are used to open chests containing dinos, weapons, and other valuable items. You'll get a free chest with a cool reward if you manage to open the required number of chests before the season ends!

– Map fixes – filled in map holes through which players could get outside the map or inside buildings/objects.

– Auto-Shooting fix – now the weapon will shoot automatically only if the target is within the damage radius.

New dinosaurs:
- Tarbosaurus Mechanical — control time, even death can't stop him!
- Archaeomanta Mechanical — take control of killed dinosaurs and own the battlefield!

Modules — Equip your dinosaurs:
- Armor and Frame modules help you live longer
- the Limbs modules increase your movement speed
- the Weapons modules improve your weapon stats
- the Heads modules increase melee damage

- Reworked maps
- Improved ping
